message: I'm feeling generous this round, Bob.  Let's start with a fair 90/10 split.  I'm sure we can work out a better deal for you in the future.
You were too generous last round, now it's my turn to be generous. But I'm not giving away 90% of the money. Let's see if you're willing to meet me halfway.
Bob, we need to find a compromise. Let's split the money evenly this round.  It's a fair deal considering the inflation, and it allows us to avoid further losses.
I'm not willing to split it evenly. I think I deserve more than 50% considering the value of the money has decreased for me. Let's see if you're willing to give me a better deal.
